append-to-body.description: Whether the drawer itself is inserted into the body element. Nested drawers must specify the property and assign it to true
append-to-body.description_zh: Drawer 自身是否插入至 body 元素上。嵌套的 Drawer 必须指定该属性并赋值为 true

:before-close.description: The callback before closing will pause the closing of the drawer
:before-close.description_zh: 关闭前的回调，会暂停 Drawer 的关闭

close-on-press-escape.description: Is it possible to turn off the Drawer by pressing ESC
close-on-press-escape.description_zh: 是否可以通过按下 ESC 关闭 Drawer

destroy-on-close.description: Controls whether all child elements are destroyed after the drawer is closed
destroy-on-close.description_zh: 控制是否在关闭 Drawer 之后将子元素全部销毁

modal.description: Whether a mask layer is required

modal-append-to-body.description: Whether the mask layer is inserted on the body element, if false, the mask layer is inserted on the Drawer's parent
modal-append-to-body.description_zh: 遮罩层是否插入至 body 元素上，若为 false，则遮罩层会插入至 Drawer 的父元素上

direction.description: The direction in which the Drawer opens

show-close.description: Whether or not to display a close button

size.description: The size of the Drawer form, in pixels when using the 'number' type, and 'x%' when using the 'string' type, otherwise it will be interpreted as the 'number' type
size.description_zh: Drawer 窗体的大小, 当使用 `number` 类型时, 以像素为单位, 当使用 `string` 类型时, 请传入 'x%', 否则便会以 `number` 类型解释

title.description: The title of the drawer can also be passed in via a named slot (see table below).
title.description_zh: Drawer 的标题，也可通过具名 slot （见下表）传入

visible.description: Whether or not to display the Drawer, with support for the .sync modifier
visible.description_zh: 是否显示 Drawer，支持 .sync 修饰符

wrapperClosable.description: Click on the mask layer to see if you can close the Drawer
wrapperClosable.description_zh: 点击遮罩层是否可以关闭 Drawer

withHeader.description: Controls whether the header bar is displayed, which is true by default, and when this is false, neither the title attribute nor the title slot will take effect
withHeader.description_zh: 控制是否显示 header 栏, 默认为 true, 当此项为 false 时, title attribute 和 title slot 均不生效

events.name: opened
events.description: Drawer opens the callback at the end of the animation
events.description_zh: Drawer 打开动画结束时的回调

events.name: closed
events.description: Drawer closes the callback at the end of the animation
events.description_zh: Drawer 关闭动画结束时的回调
